name: Nature's Wraith
description:
Team: Kaioken

Members: SirSilverStreak, Izzy, Zirun, Saran

Rules:

In this game your goal is to destroy as many monsters as possible while maintaining your health and collecting experience orbs. Your score at the end of the game will be determined by your health multiplied by your experience points. At any time during the game you can press spacebar to die and "cash in" your score.

Controls:

W: move up

S: move down

A: move left

D: move right

up arrow: attack up

down arrow: attack down

right arrow: attack right

left arrow: attack left

spacebar: die

NOTE: Sound effects in current version are loud and will be fixed in a future patch

-Submitted for Home of Nerds gamejam 2017.

Check out the code for yourself here.
